title: DOJ Public Corruption Division Systematic Dismantling Coordinated Across Agencies
summary: Trump administration systematically dismantles federal government ability to pursue public corruption cases through coordinated personnel purges and case dismissals. Actions include forcing Eric Adams prosecution dismissal, firing prosecutors who worked Capitol riot cases, and pushing out senior FBI officials, representing coordinated effort to eliminate institutional capacity for investigating systematic corruption.

sources.title: How Trump's Justice Department has gutted the government's ability to chase public corruption
